articles.author: John Schuhmann
articles.title: Knicks-Pacers: 5 takeaways from Indiana's stunning comeback in Game 1 - NBA
articles.description: Down 17 in the 4th and 14 with little more than 3 minutes left in regulation, Indiana rallies to win in overtime.
articles.content:
Down 14 with 3 minutes left, Tyrese Haliburton's buzzer-beater sends Game 1 to overtime and helps Indiana stun New York.
NEW YORK — The Indiana Pacers do not play conventional NBA basketball in eith… [+9260 chars]

articles.author: Sylvia Hui
articles.title: What to know about the deal to transfer sovereignty of the disputed Chagos Islands - AP News
articles.description: The governments of Britain and Mauritius have signed a deal settling the future of the Chagos Islands after overcoming last-minute legal hurdles. The contested archipelago in the middle of the Indian Ocean is home to a strategically important U.S. military ba…
articles.content: LONDON (AP) The governments of Britain and Mauritius signed a deal to settle the future of the Chagos Islands, the contested archipelago in the middle of the Indian Ocean, after overcoming last-minut… [+5136 chars]
